column2: 为什么街上会有妖怪！这到底是怎么回事？你们是谁，从哪里来，为什么在我的书房里？
column3: Umm…why are there monsters in the streets? Can someone please tell me what's going on here? Who are you guys, and where did you come from? And why are you in my study?!

column2: 你这人好多问题呀，难道看不出来吗，我们是妖怪呀，当然是来自异界。
column3: Oh so many questions! Can't you see? We're monsters! So we came from Mythos, of course.

column2: 喂，小狐狸，这个人看起来好笨呀，真的能放心结成契约吗？
column3: Well little fox, you sure found yourself a slow one here… Are you sure we should go on with this one as your Keeper?

column2: ……呃解释太复杂你也听不懂，总之我们是异界的妖怪，是通过古书这种媒介来到人界的
column3: Uh, it's complicated, and you wouldn't understand anyway. The point is we are monsters from Mythos, and we came to your world through the Book of Ancient.

column2: 总之，我来到这里后就被冰雪女王追杀，慌乱中开了异界传送门，没想到连到了你的书柜……
column3: Let's put it this way, when I got here, Chione tried to kill me. I frantically opened the Mythos teleport gates, and I ended up flying out of your bookcase…

column2: 是呀，现在异界的很多妖怪都来到了人界，因为那边……
column3: Yep! There are already a lot of monsters that have come to the real world, because you know in Mythos…

column2: 总之，妖怪是依靠人类对我们的信仰生存的，所以很多妖怪来到人界，是为了获得信仰之力。
column3: Simply put, monsters rely on the belief of mankind to exist. That's their mytho essence. That's why many monsters have come to the real world, they want to get the power of more people believing.
Mytho… essence? What do you mean?

column2: 总之跟你说你也不懂，跟我一起来见识一下吧
column3: So basically… Ah forget it, you wouldn't get it anyway! Let's just go have a look instead.

column2: 镇上的妖怪好像形成了集团。
column3: All the monsters in town seem to have divided into groups.

column2: 是呀，现在镇上有三个大妖怪集团呢，要想说服他们不再厮杀可不容易。
column3: Yes, there are currently three main groups of monsters in town. It will be difficult to convince them all to stop fighting with each other.

column2: 时间紧急，我们分头行动吧。你和我分别去劝说一个妖怪集团。
column3: We're running short on time! Let's split up, and each of us will try to persuade a different monster group.

column2: 哼，闻到这些喽啰们的气味我就知道，这个地方的首领肯定是皮影。
column3: Hmm... from the reek of these bandits, I can tell right away that their leader is Shadow Puppet.

column2: 是呀，一种掌控影子的怪物，如果不小心，就会被他拖进永恒的黑暗！
column3: Yeah, a monster that controls the shadows. If we're not careful, we'll be dragged into eternal darkness!
(Sounds like you guys were fighting before...)

column2: 总之如果是皮影的话，那就要做好充分的准备，看来我要拿出点本事了。
column3: Point is, if it's Shadow Puppet, then we need to be prepared. Looks like I'm gonna have to bust out some more serious abilities.

column2: 好了，我们看看雪娃娃那边怎么样了
column3: Ok, let's see how our little snow princess is doing!
Huh? I don't like that look… What's wrong?

column2: 被……全灭了……那里的妖怪被……全灭了……
column3: Destroyed... All of them… There were no monsters left!
What do you mean? Who could do such a thing?

column2: 小妖怪们说，好像是一个人类……
column3: Some other monsters said that they believe a human is behind it…

column2: 人类？我知道了！一定是散布流言的那个人，只要妖怪们互相吞并，他最后只要干掉最大的妖怪，就能获得全部信仰之力！
column3: A human? I know! It must be the one who was spreading all those rumors! He wants the monsters to destroy each other, leaving only the last monster for him to defeat! Then take all the myth essence.

column2: 如果是这样的话，他下一个目标一定是最后那个妖怪集团，我们快去！
column3: If that's so, then his next target will be the last remaining group of monsters. Let's go!

column2: 刚才小妖怪们说，那个人类似乎还有妖怪帮手
column3: Just now, a little monster told me that the human has monsters helping him.

column2: 这么说的话，他也是代行者……我们要小心应付
column3: If that's true, then he is also a monster keeper... We should be careful.

column2: 前面就是了，我感受到了很恐怖的力量！我们一定要做好万全的准备。
column3: It's just ahead! I sense a terrible power here, so let's be on our guard!

column2: 不好，来晚了，这里妖怪首领的气息消失了
column3: Sorry, I came late, the leader's genki seems vapourized.

column2: 呵呵，没想到还有自投罗网的妖怪，守护龙，你的餐后甜点来了
column3: Haha, it seems more have fallen right into our trap! Guardian Dragon your dessert has arrived!

column2: 你就是谣言的散布者！你的目的是什么？
column3: You're the one that has been spreading the rumors! What's your purpose behind all this?

column2: 呵呵，目的？当然是夺取信仰之力，只要有足够的信仰之力，就能通过这颗金苹果打开异界的通道，完整的守护龙就能降临人间！
column3: Why I am stealing all the essence, duh! With enough myth essence, this Golden Apple will open the path to Mythos, and mankind will witness the terror of a complete (but still hungry) Guardian Dragon!

column2: 金苹果，坏了！他是守护龙的代行者！
column3: Golden Apple! Not good! That's the Guardian Dragon's keeper!

column2: 真是一只见多识广的小狐狸，守护龙，上，撕裂这些挡路者！
column3: You sure know a lot for being such a little fox! Go Guardian Dragon! Get rid of these pests!

column2: 可恶，如果不是因为“墙”守护龙不会这么弱，看来我只好动用最后的王牌了……
column3: Damn! If it wasn't for that "wall," Guardian Dragon wouldn't be so weak. It seems I will have to use my last resort…

column2: 不好，他要让守护龙吃下金苹果！
column3: Not good! He wants to let the Guardian Dragon eat the Golden Apple!

column2: 竟然是你偷袭我……咳咳……我只想见到守护龙……你们……咳咳……
column3: So it was you who attacked me…Arghhh... I only wanted to see Guardian Dragon… Arghhh... But you all… Arghhh…

column2: 守护龙被击败了，他的代行者的生命也会同时消亡……
column3: Because the Guardian Dragon was defeated, its keeper will now also disappear…

column2: 多亏了你们，他是一个通缉犯，已经在世界各地杀掉了很多妖怪，我追捕多时，今天终于把他捉到了。
column3: You all have my thanks. He was a wanted man. You couldn't imagine how many monsters he has already killed. I've been hunting him for some time now, and today it has finally come to an end.

column2: 这部手机给你，如果想知道妖怪和你所戴眼镜的事情，就来找我吧。
column3: Here, take this phone. If you ever want to know more about monsters or the eyepiece you carry, just find me.

column2: 那个老头是谁，这么厉害竟然能一下干掉一条守护龙。
column3: Who was that? Strong enough to take out a Guardian Dragon with one shot!

column2: ……我总觉得他有些面熟，是在哪里见过呢……
column3: I feel like I've seen that person before, but where…

column2: 我看看……这好像是被特殊加工过的手机，只能接收到特定的信号。
column3: Lemme see... It seems this phone has been modified. It can only receive certain signals…

column2: 那老头让你用这个找他，可这里面没有他的信息呀，是不是老糊涂了……
column3: So that mysterious person wants you to use this to contact him… But he didn't leave any info about himself… Maybe he's just old and confused?

column2: 咦，手机自己响了……有信息？
column3: Wow, the phone just beeped… What's the message?

column2: 可是只有一个SOS怎么去找呀。
column3: But what good is a SOS if we can't find the location?

column2: 带上手机，我觉得如果接近目标它还会有反应的。
column3: Just bring the phone along. If we come close to the target, I'm sure it will activate somehow.

column2: 这边的反应比较弱，我们再去别的地方看看吧。
column3: The phone doesn't seem to be doing anything yet, let's move on and try elsewhere.

column2: 这边的反应也不强呀，小狐狸你是不是迷路了。
column3: There is no activity here either. Are you sure we're not lost little fox?

column2: 之前我听凯尔说什么“墙”，那是怎么回事呀……
column3: I heard Kyle mention something about a "wall." What was all that about...

column2: 在人界和异界之间有一道屏障，如果一边的生物想穿越到对面的世界，就会被屏障附上新世界的“规则”
column3: There is a barrier between the real world and Mythos. If a creature want to travel from one world to the other, the barrier will force it to conform to the rules of the world it is entering.

column2: 比如在人界，本来是没有妖怪存在的，所以我要过来的话，妖力会被大大减弱到这个世界可以允许的水平
column3: For example, the real world originally didn't have any monsters. So if a monster crosses the barrier, it will be weakened to a level that the real world can accept.

column2: 诶！这么说你们在异界比在这里强大多了！
column3: Wow! So that means that in Mythos you monsters are actually much stronger!

column2: 那还用说，如果在异界，哪还用像现在这样费事，哪怕千里之外的SOS信号，我也能立刻找到目标。
column3: Of course! Why, if we were in Mythos, we wouldn't need to go to all this trouble. Even if an SOS signal came from thousands of miles away, we could find the source in an instant!
Shhh, it seems we are getting close to our target.

column2: 呃……我想了想不对呀，这么说来，人类之前的传说和神话都是翻墙来的妖怪了？
column3: I knew something wasn't right. So that means that mankind's early legends and myths were all monsters that crossed the barrier to the real world?

column2: ……不，在之前，异界和人界是没有墙的
column3: Nope. Originally there was no barrier between Mythos and the real world.

column2: 没有墙？也就是说之前这两个世界之间是可以自由往来的？那墙是怎么出现的？
column3: No barrier… That means you could freely cross between the two worlds? Then where did the barrier come from?

column2: 我也不是很清楚……我的记忆很模糊，在我知道的时候，墙已经在那里了
column3: I don't really know… My memories aren't very clear. As far as I can remember, it was always there.

column2: 九尾狐不是至少活了一千年吗，难道一千年前……
column3: But haven't you already lived for a 1000 years? So that means that 1000 years before…

column2: 你们别说话了，手机又有反应了，求救的人就在前面。
column3: You two can discuss this later. Look! The phone is acting up again. The distress signal is coming from just ahead!

column2: 啊……得救了，还以为会被这些妖怪吃了……
column3: You've saved me!! Boy, I thought I was going to be eaten alive by those monsters…
Yes, much appreciated! I am Amanda.

column2: 阿曼达？！你是那个著名的插画师？！画河童漫画的那个？
column3: Amanda?! Aren't you that famous artist? The one who makes that Kappa manga?

column2: 呃，是我，多谢你救了我，你也有这个手机？
column3: Uh, yeah, that's me. Thanks for the rescue! Oh… So you also have one of these phones?

column2: 是呀，一个神秘的老头给我的。
column3: Yeah, some mysterious old guy gave it to us.

column2: 我的是读者寄来的匿名礼物，没想到在这里派上了用场。
column3: I received mine in a package from an anonymous reader. I didn't expect that it would end up working here.

column2: 河童的代行者，这里太危险了，有什么话一会再说
column3: Kappa Keeper, it's very dangerous here. We can discuss these things later…

column2: 喂你们等等，还有好多妖怪被捉到了这个神社里面
column3: Hey, wait you guys! There are still lots of monsters trapped inside the shrine.

column2: 妖怪被捉怎么回事，我们不是已经把黑龙干掉了吗
column3: How could monsters get trapped there? Didn't we already defeat that Black Dragon?

column2: 最近似乎有很多妖怪平白无故的失踪了
column3: Recently there have been many monsters mysteriously disappearing.
Disappearing? Are you sure they didn't just return to Mythos?

column2: 根本不是的，我的朋友就失踪了，也没有回异界
column3: No, no they're really disappearing. A friend of mine is missing now, and I know for sure that she didn't return to Mythos.

column2: 似乎妖怪的失踪是一个神秘组织抓走的，我们根据线索来到这个神社
column3: It seems that there is a mysterious organization behind the disappearance of these monsters. We followed the clues right to this shrine.

column2: （神秘组织……不会跟那个神秘老人有什么关系吧）
column3: (Mysterious organization… I wonder if that mysterious old man we ran into earlier could have anything to do with it?)

column2: 这个神社可能就是神秘组织的据点，我们要小心
column3: This shrine could very well be the hideout for that mysterious organization. We should be careful.

column2: 你们真厉害，刚才我们就是被神社里的幻术困住，你们竟然没事
column3: Wow, you guys are awesome! We were just now trapped by illusions in the shrine. I'm glad we made it in one piece.

column2: 幻术？什么幻术，我怎么没感觉到……
column3: Illusions? What illusions? I didn't see anything…

column2: 咦，小狐狸，这里有你的雕像！
column3: Hey, look little fox, it's a statue of you!

column2: 我的雕像？等等，我好像想起什么了……这里，好像是我们家族在人界的栖息地？
column3: A statue? Wait, this reminds me of something... This place seems to be the habitat of our family here in the real world?

column2: 怪不得你不会被这里的幻术控制
column3: No wonder you're not affected by the illusions.

column2: 小心，有妖怪过来了！咦？他们好像被控制了？
column3: Careful, more monsters are coming! And it seems that they are being somehow controlled?

column2: 好像就是他们控制了这些妖怪
column3: It seems it was them who were controlling the monsters.

column2: 这种妖精我从未见过……难道……这是人造的，有人在故意制造妖怪！
column3: I have never seen this kind of creature before. They appear to be manmade. Could it be… Someone is intentionally creating monsters!

column2: 啊啊啊他们聚集到那颗树上了！那棵树也被他们控制了！
column3: Ahhh! More are gathering in that tree! The tree is also being controlled by them!

column2: 终于处理了这些烦人的妖精，如果这是人造的妖精，那么黑暗组织绑架其他的妖怪，很可能就是为了制造妖精！
column3: Ugh, finally done with those pesky little creatures. If they are manmade, then it is possible that the monsters being kidnapped are being used to make them!

column2: 这里还没有他们的线索，这些混蛋肯定藏在了其他的地方，可恶！
column3: There are no other clues here. These jerks are definitely hiding out somewhere else.
This tree is no ordinary tree!

column2: 这是世界树的幼苗，这棵树的内部还有空间！
column3: This is a World Tree seedling. Look, it's hollow inside.

column2: 小狐狸干得漂亮！没想到树里还有这么大的森林
column3: Good job little fox! I would have never guessed that inside the tree lies a huge forest!

column2: 世界树本来就是孕育世界的神奇生物，成年的世界树可以支撑起一个世界，这个幼年的世界树中有这么大的空间完全不奇怪
column3: The World Tree was originally the magical creature that conceived the world. A fully grown World Tree can support an entire world, it's no wonder that this young sapling has so much space inside.
This place reeks of Dragon Girl.

column2: 这么说那些被捉走的妖怪果然在这个树洞里！
column3: That means that the kidnapped mosters must be inside this tree!

column2: 这里如果是那个黑暗组织的巢穴，那么戒备肯定森严，我们要小心。
column3: If this is the lair of that dark organization, then that means it should be guarded. Proceed with caution.

column2: 小狐狸，你们去做诱饵引开那些守卫，我趁机去救人怎么样？
column3: Little fox, go buy us some time by distracting the guards. In the meantime, we'll go and save as many as we can.

column2: 这个确实是比较快的方案了，只要小心的话不会有什么问题。
column3: I know it's hasty plan, but it should work as long as we're all careful.

column2: 喂喂……还要往前走吗，感觉要被他们发现了……
column3: Wait, wait! Do we still need to go any further? Don't you think we'll be spotted?

column2: 别害怕，只要引开落新妇，就算是完成任务了
column3: Don't worry, we just need to lure out Nephila and are job here will be done.
Shhh… Keep it down! We don't want to be…

column2: 坏了！果然被发现了，只能蛮干了！
column3: Oh no! We've been spotted! Ok guys, get ready to fight!

column2: ……都怪这个胆小鬼，差点连命都没了……
column3: It's all this sissy's fault... We almost didn't make it back there…

column2: 谁是胆小鬼！女孩子怕蜘蛛怎么了！还那么大一只！
column3: Who are you calling a sissy? Girls are afraid of spiders. So what?! (and it was a big one too…)

column2: 嘘……小点声……别再引来怪物……
column3: Ok, ok… Just keep your voice down. We don't want to end up getting caught again…

column2: 前面就是关押妖怪的地方了吧……我们快去救人吧。
column3: Just ahead is where they are keeping the monsters… Let's go save them!

column2: 哈哈哈，欢迎来到森之牢狱！
column3: Hahaha, welcome to the forest! Or should I say… Prison!!!

column2: 你就是绑架妖怪的始作俑者吗！
column3: So you are the one behind all the monster kidnappings!

column2: 绑架，不要说得那么难听，我只是让这些异界逃来的可怜虫变得更加强大。
column3: Kidnapping? It sounds bad when you put it that way… I was only just helping these worthless Mythos escapees to become stronger.
You bastard! Don't even think of running!

column2: 跑？我怎么会跑？盛大的欢迎宴会才刚刚开始。
column3: Running? Why would I run? Why the welcoming banquet has only just begun!

column2: 啊，那是龙女！她……她也被控制了！
column3: Ah, Dragon Girl! She… She is being controlled!

column2: 呵呵，你能对昔日的朋友下手吗？
column3: Ahaha! Seeing old friends reunited always brings so much emotion... I'll leave you guys to catch up. Hahaha

column2: 别担心，他只是妖力用尽晕了过去。
column3: Don't worry, her powers have been drained, that's all.

column2: 可恶，怎么才能把她从控制中救出来！
column3: Damn, how do we save her from being controlled!

column2: 控制……对了！你快使用照妖镜！
column3: Controlled… Oh that's right! Use the Mytho Lens!

column2: 对！你用照妖镜能够看到的，那些控制龙女的妖精的弱点。
column3: Right! You can use the Mytho lens to see the weakpoints of the creatures controlling Dragon Girl.

column2: 怎……怎么可能！你到底是谁，你为什么能够击败这些妖精！
column3: How… How could it be? Who are you! And how are you able to defeat my minions!

column2: 不…呵呵…不管你是谁，都不能阻止我，阻止组织！
column3: But it matters not… Haha! Whoever who you may be, you cannot stop me. You cannot stop our plan!

column2: 我要让你看看，美杜莎的代行者的厉害！
column3: It's time for you to see the power of Medusa's keeper!

column2: 没想到这个人夺取了这么多妖怪的能力！
column3: I had no idea that this person had stolen the power of so many monsters!

column2: 如果还有妖怪来到人界，一定还会被这个黑暗组织盯上……
column3: If monsters keep coming to the real world, for sure they will just keep being caught by these guys…

column2: 说起来，到底异界发生了什么，为什么妖怪会来到人界？
column3: So what exactly happened on Mythos? Why are so many monsters coming to the real world?

column2: 我们去异界看个清楚吧
column3: Why don't we go to Mythos and you can see for ourselves?

column2: …………好吧，不过回到异界唯一的办法就是房间里的传送门了
column3: Alright… But the only way back to Mythos is through the portal in the bedroom.

column2: 啊！为什么传到了这么讨厌的地方！
column3: Ah! How did we end up here?!

column2: 这里是异界七大国度的火之国……传送门不稳定，这里离我们的目的地还很远
column3: This is the Fire Kingdom, one of the seven  kingdoms of Mythos… It seems our portal isn't entirely stable. This is pretty far off from where we had intended to go.

column2: 我怎么感觉身体不太舒服
column3: Ughhh… I don't feel so well.

column2: 因为穿过了屏障，人类也会被屏障削弱，就像妖怪去人界的时候一样，在这里千万不要轻举妄动
column3: It's because you passed through the barrier. Humans are also weakened by the barrier, just like when monsters come to the real world. We need to be on our guard here.

column2: 火之国的统治者是工匠之神，是个十分可怕的存在……
column3: The leader of Fire Kingdom is the God of Craft…... One scary dude…

column2: 热死了……我感觉我要化掉了……
column3: It's so hot, I think I'm melting…
Me too… I'm about to dry up…

column2: 整个火之国都是建立在一个巨大的火山中……在这里生活的全是一些喜爱火炎的神怪
column3: All of the Fire Kingdom is located within one massive volcano. The monsters that exist here tend to love fire and flames.

column2: 啊……前面好像有一座大雪山~你们看到没？
column3: Ah, but what is that big snowy mountain that lies just ahead. Do you see it too?
Oh nice… A big snowy mountain…

column2: 喂喂……已经出现海市蜃楼的幻觉了吗……
再往前走，是火鸟的栖息地了
column3: Just a little further is the Firebird habitat.

column2: 是呀，因为火鸟的能力是涅槃，可以浴火重生，所以他们一遇到不开心的事就自焚了，是一群丧心病狂的纵火犯
column3: Yeah, because Firebird's ability is Nirvana, it can be reborn from the ashes. So the moment she encounters anything unfavorable, she burns herself… Like a group of crazy arsonists…

column2: 总之我们还是离他们远点比较好……
column3: Overall, it's best to keep our distance from her…

column2: 前面是大天狗的住处了，听说他是一个盲人，却拥有很强大的占卜能力呢~

column2: 说到恋爱你神采奕奕，完全不像是被热晕了的样子了呢……
column3: Now you're thinking about finding love! Hey, what happened to that look of heat stroke you had a moment ago…
Hmph, that's none of your business!
Blind fortune teller, sounds pretty accurate.

column2: 哇！果然有大天狗！快帮我占卜！
column3: Wow! It is Tengu after all! Quick tell my fortune!

column2: 嗯，这位小姐，你的面色很差呢，或许会有大灾难……
column3: Yes. This girl… I can see from your poor facial complexion… A great catastrophe is coming for you…

column2: 你一个瞎子怎么看出她的面色的？
column3: How could a blind man see someone's complexion? And so fast…

column2: 啊……哈哈……老夫身体不适，今天就不占卜了……
column3: Ah, well… My wife is not feeling well, so no more fortunes today.

column2: 喂喂……别打了！我错了还不行吗！扮演瞎子只是为了让占卜更可信啊……
column3: Hey, take it easy. No need to fight, hehe! Ok so I was all a lie... I just pretend to be blind to make my fortunes more believable…

column2: 哼，没想到你是这样的瞎子，快说火神殿怎么走
column3: Hmph, I never would have guessed you were like this. Just tell us how to get to the  Ember Palace.

column2: 你们要去找工匠之神？过了这片山谷，前面就是了。
column3: You guys want to go find the God of Craft? Cross this valley, and then it's just ahead.

column2: 嗯……算了没事……你回到故乡的时候千万要小心……
column3: Ah forget it… Just be careful when you return to your hometown.

column2: 按照大天狗所说，出了前面的山谷就应该能看到火神殿了。
column3: According to Tengu, we should be able to see the Ember Palace once we get out the valley.

column2: 距离火神殿还有一段路
column3: We still have a ways to go before we reach the Ember Palace.

column2: 喂喂，九尾，打底异界发生了什么，为什么你们会到人界去呢？
column3: Hey, 9-Tails! So what exactly happened in Mythos. Why did you guys ever want to come to the real world?
You'll understand when we get there.

column2: 这里就是火神殿的前面了，不出意外的话，会有伊芙利特守卫在这里，我们要小心。
column3: This is the front of Ember Palace. If we avoid any other problems, there should be Ifrit guards here. We should be careful.

column2: 前面马上就要进入火神殿了
column3: Ok the entrance to the palace should be just ahead.

column2: 工匠之神，到底是个什么样子的人？
column3: So what kind of creature is the God of Craft exactly?

column2: 工匠之神十分可怕……总之你见到的时候千万不要乱说话
column3: Absolutely terrifying… Just don't say anything to upset him once we meet him.
Huh? You are here to see me?

column2: 诶？！这是工匠之神？这明明是个小孩子呀！
column3: What? This is the God of Craft!? This is obviously just a little kid!

column2: 住！住嘴！工匠之神大人！他什么也没说！
column3: Stop! Be quiet! Oh God…..God of Craft!! Ignore him, he's doesn't really have his marbles together you know…

column2: 呐？你就是工匠之神，好可爱，快放我们通过火之国吧。
column3: So you are the God of Craft. A real cutie! Now can you help us cross the Fire Kingdom?

column2: 工匠之神一害怕的时候就会大哭，一大哭的时候就会释放吞噬天地的爆炎之力
column3: As soon as God of Craft is scared, he will cry. Once he starts crying, he releases his powers, engulfing everything around him in flames!

column2: 这里就是你的雪之国吗？
column3: So this is your Snow Kingdom?

column2: 是呀，可是，感觉好像有些不对……
column3: Yes, this is it. But something doesn't seem right...

column2: 我不知道，雪的感觉跟之前不一样了……
column3: I'm not sure, it just seems the snow is different somehow…

column2: 那是…狼人！？雪之国应该没有狼人的！
column3: Is that a… Werewolf! The Snow Kingdom shouldn't have Werewolves!

column2: 雪之国……一定发生了什么……
column3: Snow Kingdom… Something must have happened…

column2: 出现了不该出现在这里的妖怪，这到底是怎么回事
column3: Monsters that shouldn't be here appearing suddenly, I wonder what's going on.

column2: 前面那个妖怪是梦魇，我们要小心别被他拖进梦里！
column3: The monster just ahead is a Bangungot. Be careful not to be dragged into his dream!

column2: 在前面就是我的行宫了，我被卷到人界的时候正在喝茶……
column3: Just ahead is one of my palaces. I remember I was just there drinking tea before being swept away to the real world…

column2: 呼，那么说到这里应该安全些了……
column3: Whew, so it should be safer there, right?

column2: 行宫中留着我的雪人守卫，那些外来的家伙根本进不来
column3: With the snowman guards inside my palace, those monsters from the outside shouldn't be able to get in.

column2: 雪人……守卫，你不会是说对面那个家伙吧……
column3: Snowman… Guards… You mean those guys over there?

column2: 是呀~小雪人，我回来啦~咦……小雪人？
column3: Yeah! Hey little snowmen, I'm back! Huh? Little snowmen?

column2: 小雪人…为什么不认识我了……
column3: Why don't the snowmen recognize me?

column2: 这个事很诡异……雪人的情况，好像我们在森之国看到的那些被控制的妖怪一样
column3: This is all very strange… It seems like the snowmen are being controlled just like those monsters in the Forest Kingdom.

column2: 你是说…也有坏人来到了雪之国？
column3: Are you saying that evil has also come to the Snow Kingdom?

column2: 雪之国的镇守者在哪里，看来我们还是需要去提醒一下。
column3: Where is the defender of the Snow Kingdom? It seems we need to go remind him what to do!

column2: 你是说小冰龙吗，他的行宫离这里还很远。
column3: You mean the Ice Dragon? His palace is still far from here.

column2: 小冰龙平时都躲着不见人，路上都是他的守卫，我们要小心。
column3: The Ice Dragon usually keeps himself hidden away from people, and these monsters watching the way are all his guards. We should keep an eye out.

column2: 要小心她的弓箭，很厉害的。
column3: Be careful of her arrows, they pack quite a punch.

column2: 冰鸟的尾巴是它的法力源泉，可以尝试去击破。
column3: The Ice Bird's tail is her source of power. You can try attacking it.

column2: 咦？这家伙的角有些奇怪……
column3: Huh? The horns on this one are a little strange…

column2: 前面就是小冰龙的行宫了
column3: The Ice Dragon's palace is just up ahead.

column2: 我们要小心，没准敌人已经到了这里
column3: We should proceed with caution, the enemy could be upon us before we even know it.

column3: Ice Dragon! Something has gone wrong, a group of monsters have invaded…

column2: 可恨的外来者，你休想侵占雪之国！
column3: You outsiders! You'll never invade the Snow Kingdom!
Ice Dragon? Don't you remember me?
Uh oh, now he's even more crazy!

column2: 你们快走，在他的身后就是通往下一个国度的入口。
column3: You guys should go. Just behind him is the gateway to the next kingdom.

column2: 我来拦住小冰龙，怎么说我也是这个雪之国的国王呢。
column3: I'll stop the Ice Dragon, after all I am the ruler of the Snow Kingdom.

column2: 谁也别想破坏冰雪女王的国度！！！
column3: No one could destroy the kingdom of Queen Chione!!

column2: 小冰龙……够了……你已经足够努力了……我就在这里……
column3: Ice Dragon… Enough!! You have already done enough… I am here…

column2: 这里是什么地方，怎么这么暗……
column3: Where are we? It's so dark…

column2: 你想多了……死亡之国也只不过是异世界的一个国度而已
column3: Don't be silly… The Death Kingdom is just another kingdom of Mythos.

column2: 回雪之国的路已经被雪女冰封了，我们只能前进了。
column3: The way back to the Kingdom of Snow has already been sealed by Chione… We can only go forward now.

column2: 独角兽是长眠的领路人，要注意她的角。
column3: The Unicorn is a dead guide for us, pay attention to her horn.

column2: 看来这里还没有像森之国和雪之国一样被邪恶势力所侵染
column3: It seems there are no invaders here, unlike the Forest Kingdom and Snow Kingdom.

column3: Let's go to the Nether River and look for Charon. He should be able to lead us out of here.

column3: Don't look directly at the heart on top of Empusa's head. It will seduce you.

column2: 接受了冥界力量洗礼的伊芙利特，比火之国的更可怕。
column3: This Ifrit has undergone the rituals of the underworld, and is much more terrible than the one we met in the Fire Kingdom.

column3: The Nether River lies just ahead. The road will get more dangerous from here, but don't look back!

column2: 女妖的魂器里装满了灵魂，这是她的法力源泉。
column3: The Banshee's amulet is full of souls. This is her source of power.

column2: 堕落的天使，圣洁的光环反而成了杀人的凶器。
column3: Fallen Angel, her holy halo has now become a weapon for murder.

column2: 地狱的守门犬，每一个头颅都不可小觑。
column3: Hellhound.... Don't underestimate any of its heads.

column3: Could that be Moon Devine? What is she doing here?

I was just about to ask you the same!

column2: 冥王说有一股邪恶力量从人界而来，让我帮忙这里的驻兵防守下，你看我这身黑色的衣服是不是特别应景，嘻嘻～对了，那邪恶势力不会是你们吧？
column3: Hades said that an evil force had come from the real world and decided to send me here. I got this black outfit just for the occasion! Hehe, by the way, that evil force wouldn't happen to be you guys?

column2: ……才不是，我们也是追着那股力量而来的
column3: Of course not! We are also chasing after the same thing!

column2: 那你们不早说，让我打了一身汗还要洗澡.
column3: Why didn't you say so earlier! Now that I'm all sweaty, I'll have to go take a shower again.

column2: 我怎么会知道你在这里……不过现在森之国和雪之国都被搞得一团乱，我怀疑他们有更大的目的，所以要回人界调查清楚
column3: How could I know you would be here… the Forest and Snow Kingdom are both a mess now. I think there is a conspiracy behind all this, so I want to return to the real world to investigate.

column2: 那你们去找卡戎吧，坐着她的船，一会儿就到人界了
column3: Then you go find Charon and take a ride on her boat. That will get you back quickly.

column2: 说起来，卡戎不是冥河的摆渡人吗，坐他的船……
column3: Right, isn't Charon the ferryman who carries souls? Take her boat……..

column2: 回到人界也只有这条路了，不过他确实是个危险的家伙，要小心……
column3: It might be dangerous, but that's the only way to go back to real world. Let's be careful.

column2: 好奇怪，我们在河岸走了这么半天，也没看到他
column3: Strange, we've been around for a while but there is no sign of Charon.
See, there is a little girl over there?

column2: 请问你见过卡戎吗，我们要坐船……
column3: Hey, have you seen Charon? We want to take her boat.

column2: 坐船？那很容易呀，但是你们买得起船票吗？
column3: Take her boat? That's easy, but can you pay the price?
Hahaha, the price is not money, its your life.

column2: 小心！她身上有卡戎的气息！
column3: Watch out! I feel Charon in her!

column2: 卡戎那家伙竟然附身在这孩子身上！
column3: How could Charon possessed such a cute little girl!

column2: 趁着卡戎被打晕了，我们快带这孩子走吧
column3: Charon seems stunned. Let's take the chance and bring the girl with us.

column2: 不但劫船，还要把这么萌的小女孩绑架到人界吗，嘿嘿嘿，好像很有趣。
column3: Stealing Charon's boat and hijacking a cute little girl from Death Kingdom! Hahaha, sounds fun!

column2: 呼……小狐狸他醒了，他终于醒了！
column3: Hey, Little Fox, he woke up! He finally woke up!

column2: 我记得我掉进了冥河……这里是天国吗……
column3: I remember that I fell into the Nether River… Am I in heaven now?
Yes, this is the Sky Kingdom.

column2: 咳咳……我们都被这个人类的小女孩救了，这里是光之国，也叫天国，不过你没死，放一万个心……
column3: Ahem... Actually we were all saved by this little girl. This is the Light Kingdom, also known as the Sky Kingdom. But you didn't die, so don't worry...

column2: 我看到你们在河里漂着，就把你们捞上来带到这里了……
column3: I saw you all floating in the river, and decided to pull you out and bring you here...
Wow, you had me worried! Wait... Are you a ghost?

column2: 是呀，我是个幽灵呢，我叫丽莎，啊这里不方便，我们一会再说吧~
column3: Sure am! My name is Lisa. But let's not discuss this here.

column2: 丽莎你不是人类的幽灵吗，为什么会在异界
column3: But you're the ghost of a human, aren't you? Why are you here on Mythos?

column2: 我也不知道怎么回事，我恢复意识后就在这里了……不过这里大家都挺好的，嘻嘻嘻
column3: Yeah I don't really understand it either. I was here when I regained consciousness... But everyone is quite nice here, hehehe.

column2: 嗯……奇怪……丽莎你知道怎么回人界吗，我需要回去。
column3: Hmm... Interesting... Lisa, do you know how to go to the real world? I need to get back there.

column2: 回人界？啊太好了，你能带我回去吗，我想或许回到人界，我没准能想起来自己是怎么死的呢，嘻嘻……
column3: Back to the real world? That's great! Can you take me with you? I was thinking to go there as well, and perhaps I'll be able to remember how I died...

column2: 没有问题呀，在这光之国有没有人能够打开通道呢？
column3: No problem! Is there anyone in the Light Kingdom that could open the way back?

column2: 光之国最厉害的，应该是精灵王子了吧，或许你可以试试去拜托他
column3: The Light Kingdom is the most powerful of all! The Prince Elve should be able to help... Perhaps we can try asking him.

column2: 嗯，那我们去找精灵王子吧
竟然是那个代行者老头，他怎么会在异界，我们快跟上去！
column3: So it's that old monster keeper. How could he be on Mythos? Let's catch up to him and see!

column2: （低声）他好像还没有发现我们
column3: (Whispering) He doesn't seem to have noticed us.

column2: （低声）他出现在这里，看来代行者连接了异界和人界是事实了
column3: (Whispering) If he's here, then that must mean he was able to really link Mythos and the real world.

column2: （低声）这么说……森之国和冰雪之国的屠杀……也是代行者组织干的了……
column3: (Whispering) That also means that he is be behind the Forest Kingdom and Snow Kingdom attacks...

column2: 刚才这位老人家的方向……好像也是去光之圣殿呢
column3: Judging from the direction he was going just now, he should be headed for the Palace of Light.

column2: 光之圣殿，难道他也要去找精灵王子，我们快跟过去！
column3: Palace of Light... Could it be that he also wants to see the Prince Elve? Let's catch up to him!

column2: 看到了，他与精灵王子聊了两句，就进了圣殿，然后我就感觉不到他的气息了！
column3: I saw it with my own eyes! He spoke with Prince Elve for a moment and entered the palace. Now I can't sense him here at all!

column2: 看来圣殿里果然有连接异界的通道，如果不是进入通道，不可能感觉不到他的存在。
column3: So it seems the palace contains a passage to the real world after all. If he was still on Mythos, I would be able to sense him here.

column2: 呵呵，少年人很努力嘛，竟然能跟得上老夫。
column3: Hehe, you young kids are quite clever these days, you've kept up with me all this time.
Be careful of the Prince Elve!

column2: 果然在圣殿后面有连接人界的通道！不过那老头不知去向了！
column3: So the passage to the real world lies behind the palace after all! But I have no idea where that old guy went!

column2: 这么说来，光之国和代行者组织之间，或许有什么阴谋……
column3: That means that Light Kingdom and that keeper are working together... Maybe there is some sort of plot behind this.

column2: 不管怎么样，只要回到人界就知道了，走吧
column3: Either way, we'll know once we get back to the real world. Let's go!
Take me with you! I want to go back too!!

column2: 嗯，好的，我们一起回人界！
这里是人界没错，我不能自己汲取信仰之力
column3: This is the real world, thre's no doubt about that. I can't make use of my Mytho Essence.

column2: 可是……这好像是一片废墟……
column3: But... These seem to be ruins of some sort...

column2: 我不知道……我就是觉得好害怕……这个废墟，很可怕……
column3: I don't know... I just feel really afraid... These ruins are scary...

column2: 不管怎样，我们先走出去再说吧
column3: Ok, let's see if we can find our way out of here.

column2: 怎么回事，这里的妖怪很多也很强，甚至比异界的妖怪还要强！
column3: What? There are a lot of monsters here, and they are really strong. Even stronger than the ones back on Mythos!

column2: 先是强的过分的花魄，又是强的过分的火鸟？
column3: First there's a super strong Flower Pixie, and then an overpowered Firebird?

column2: 花魄，火鸟，阿姆特，安普莎……莫非……
column3: Flower Pixie, Firebird, Ammut, Empusa... Could it be…

column2: 我们一直在原地打转，这个废墟利用我们的力量在运转一个法阵
column3: We've been going in circles! These ruins are using our powers to complete a magic ceremony of some sort...

column2: 嗯，草属性的花魄，火属性的火鸟，水属性的阿姆特，暗属性的安普莎，如果没错的话，前方一定是一个光属性的守护兽。
column3: Right! The grass type Flower Pixie, fire type Firebird, the water type Ammut, and then the dark type Empusa... If I'm not mistaken, there should be a light type  monster waiting for us next.

column2: 通过这个法阵，这个废墟中封印着的某些东西就会觉醒！
column3: With this magic, whatever's sealed in these ruins can be awakened!

column2: 这么说来，我们已经落入了这个废墟的陷阱？！
column3: That means we have already fallen into the trap of these ruins?!

column2: 啊啊啊啊！好可怕，有可怕的东西过来了！
column3: Ahhh! Scary! Something scary has come!

column2: 有一股十分邪恶的力量过来了，要小心！
column3: A very evil force has come, be careful!

column2: 刚才那个…是地狱七君主？！看来这个废墟下封印着不得了的东西……
column3: Were those... The 7 Deadly Sins? These ruins must contain something incredible...

column2: 小心，可能又是地狱七君主之一！
column3: Careful! It could be another one of the Deadly Sins!

column2: 九尾，这个废墟里面竟然有这么可怕的怪物，这个废墟原来到底是什么东西？
column3: Nine-tails, with such terrible monsters roaming around here, what could these ruins have originally been?

column2: 我也不知道，不过看起来像是图书馆之类的……
column3: I'm not entirely sure either, but it seems to have been a library of some sort...

column2: 头好痛……我感觉到前面有什么东西，我好像有印象，但是头好痛！
column3: My head hurts so much... I sense something up ahead, something that I seem to remember. But my head really hurts!

column2: 天呀，这是一股什么力量！
column3: Wow! What kind of force could this be!

column2: 我感觉整个人都被禁锢住了！
column3: I feel as if I'm trapped and unable to move!

column2: ……知晓一切的未来，所有未来化成的神灵……知性的亚弗戈蒙……再现于大图书馆之上吧！
column3: Knowing the future, all the dieties of the future... The knowledgable Aforgomon... Is once again on top of the Great Library!

column2: 咳咳……这个怪物是丽莎召唤出来的吗！
column3: Ughh... Was this monster summoned by Lisa!

column2: 丽莎，你这是怎么回事，啊九尾你快看，丽莎好像不对劲。
column3: Lisa, what's going on? Nine-tails, come quickly! Something's wrong with Lisa!

column2: 别过去，她身上缠绕着十分可怕的力量，被碰到我们都会粉碎！
column3: Don't move. Lisa's body is wrapped in a terrible force. Touch her and we will all be destroyed!

column2: ……献上知性的亚弗戈蒙之力，回应我的祈祷吧，存在于所有未来中的幻象，将于此间成型……降临于人世吧，幻界大图书馆！
column3: An offering for the power of Aforgomon, answer my prayers. The existance of all future visions will take shape here... It's coming to the world, the magic world's Great Library!
